text:
Question 168) Lobster nursery are built by local cooperatives of fishermen, in the shape of straight-back prism, soil-flexible and with flexible screens of the same height, capable of supporting marine corrosion. For each nursery to be built, the cooperative fully uses 100 linear meters of this screen, which is used only on the sides. Sea level What should be the values ​​of X and Y, in meter, so that the area of ​​the base of the nursery is maximum?
A) 1 and 49
B) 1 and 99
C) 10 and 10
D) 25 and 25
E) 50 and 50
